## 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
temps <- read.csv("../data/Hanover-temps21c_w-daynums.csv")
```

```{r}
head(temps)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
ggplot(temps |> filter(Year == 2022), aes(x=daynum, y=max_diff20c_avg)) +
    geom_bar(stat="identity", )

```
